post.body: it's 70-80 during the day and 60's at night :) sorry I had to rub it in ;)

that song rocks btw :)

omg U'll never believe me...I've been looking for the band that sings "far behind" since highschool!!! Now thanks to u I know!

This is hillarious ... My dad is anti having grandkids ... LOL
No more sangria in the afternoon... Leads to crazy dreams!

:O) being spoiled rotten with food :) u gotta love the parents :)

Working on my vacation :-/ *sigh*

11.5 hours! Shortest trip ever to Miami!
